column5: Well it finally starts, First ice walleyes . The great white north has finally froze !! We have no snow but we do have 4 to 6 inches of ice. Heading  to one of my favourite lakes tommorow, looking for eyes through the ice! Seems very funny running in there with the 4 wheeler instead of the snowmobile. It was a big decision, lakers or walleyes, the eyes one. Will do Lakers on the weekend. Hopefully will get some good pics to share! I will think of you all.  Have a great day, I will !!!
Good luck ! Talked with my buddy Aurele Lavigne (owned the Subway) today and he mentioned good ice was in place up there already.
Well good luck and don't forget your camera - look forward to the posting of your outing.   Don
And how far North would that be....just curious.

Charlied,  Hearst is six hours north west of Northbay, most northern point of highway # 11 , or six hours north east of Thunderbay, six hours north from Sudbury. Basically in the middle of Gods country.  Irishfield,  I know Aurele well, a group of us get togethor for a friendly game of poker when its possible! Aurele is always invited, easy money for the rest of us !! Small world !!!
Oh Yeah! You just gotta take some pictures of that!!! I'm dyin' to see the first ice fish of the year! You are waaaay on up there... aintcha?
Knock em dead Medic.  Lots of us still gots the boats out down our way. Some have mentioned they won't see storage at all this year. ( Niagara River fishing).
First Ice in Hearst, +16 Celcius in the GTA.

Yeah we all love the see first ice shots. It would sure enlighten the hearts of those who have been waiting for awhile and still have to wait til  (like me ) January through to February for hardwater action.   dsn  Thanks

Hard guy to keep away from a casino! Even has cards painted on his airplane. Great guy..real hyper...   I always stop to see him on my way thru town to Fushimi...or he'll come out to the lake to fish with the guy that owns the CTC store behind McDonalds.
